moves.title: Reflector (Down Special)
changes: Behavior normalized with Fox, Wolf and Ness (only changes vertical acceleration when held)

moves.title: Up Tilt
changes: Initial hitbox properties adjusted to make more sense in hitbox viewers
Now has darkness effect on hit

moves.title: Final Smash
changes: Completely revamped; now gives buffed movement and infinite Solar Beams for 30 seconds

moves.title: Inhale (Neutral Special)
changes: PK Flash frame data now matches Ness
Bowser Fireball now properly terminates on hit
Samus Charge Shot frame data now matches Samus
Zero Suit Samus blaster projectile velocity now matches ZSS
Falcon Punch turnaround behavior matched to Captain Falcon
Shadow Ball movement now matches Mewtwo’s

moves.title: Final Cutter (Up Special)
changes: Cutter Dash input deadzone removed

moves.title: Spin Dash (Down Special)
changes: Can no longer be used to Bucket Brake

moves.title: Up Smash
changes: Hit 1 Damage 4 > 6, Hits 3 and 4 now function similarly to PM 3.6, angles now match 3.6

moves.title: Extreme Speed (Up Special)
changes: Hitbox now always sends in the direction Lucario is moving

moves.title: Other
changes: Back roll IASA 33 > 32

moves.title: Spin Dash (Down Special)
changes: Can no longer be used to Bucket Brake

moves.title: Other
changes: Eggs no longer despawn when Yoshi dies
Ungrabbable hurtboxes during shield made intangible to prevent any shieldpoking edge cases

moves.title: Down Special (Waft)
changes: Can no longer die off the top with his own Waft

moves.title: Fourside
changes: L-alt (New Pork City) GFX and SFX restored

moves.title: Golden Temple
changes: Cloud animation fixed
Stage banner now matches alts correctly

moves.title: Pictochat
changes: R-alt now has “C” on the left side to match the stage itself
Module for default/Brawl versions fixed

moves.title: Training Room
changes: New L+R alt: Green Screen

changes.title: Characters and Gameplay
changes: Moving platform behavior fix redone to fix edge case warping
Various instances of clipping through stages fixed
Wall tech invincibility normalized cast-wide (20 frames)
No-hitstun/no hitlag moves now properly refresh recovery resources for select characters
Overtime now only applies to stock matches
Grab Release fix applied to inhales (characters with actionable recoveries now regain their move when spit out or swallowed)
Characters with more than 16 costumes no longer break horde battles
Springs will now not automatically center characters when landed on
Charizard’s knockdown getup attack no longer sends opponents to the blastzone when shielded, along with other small file corruption problems
Ice Climbers can no longer get stuck to each other if hit frame perfectly out of Side Special
Mario and Luigi’s lying down getup attacks no longer have stray fixed knockback hitboxes
Marth’s Side Special can no longer retain momentum when going offstage from onstage
Olimar’s Pikmin no longer encounter issues while/after grabbing ledge
Pikachu will no longer clip through the stage after using Quick Attack
Fixed issue where Snake would keep billowing dirt clouds near his legs if the ending to the animation was interrupted
Fixed issue where dirt would instantly disappear at Snake’s feet if he interrupted the ending of the down smash placement animation
Sonic can no longer take an opponent’s jumps with Spring
Transforming with Sheik no longer allows Sheik to enter the needle charge animation after transforming back if she already has five needles

Smash attack charging damage fixed on ZSS, Ness and Knuckles to properly scale with charge. (Applies to ZSS’ up smash and forward smash, Ness’ up smash and down smash and Knuckles’ down smash when used downwards)

changes.title: Stages/Music
changes: Bowser’s victory theme in P+ Lite no longer loops
D-Pad functionality for alternate stage loading fixed
Fixed issue where trying to add more stages to page 3 than were present on page 1 would result in duplicate stage slots
Fixed issue where Battlefield’s lighting would instantly swap settings during certain times of the in-stage day
Fixed problem where Luigi’s Mansion had rendering issues near the lower entryways
Module for default/Brawl versions of Pictochat fixed
Golden Temple’s clouds now have smoother animation; foliage and polygon count on default and R-alt variations improved

changes.title: Other
changes: Fixed PM-era issue where Classic and All-Star modes would mistakenly show you a picture of Zero Suit Samus instead of Wario-Man
Fixed issue where Boss Battles would crash if entered after exiting the All-Star rest area
Giga Bowser can now complete All-Star mode
Fighting Ridley no longer crashes Boss Battles
Boss Battles now gives proper ending
Samus AI will now crouch properly in Training Mode if set to do so

changes.title: Characters/Costumes
changes: Implemented new Hitbox, ECB, and Ledge renderers, and added Stage renderer into debug mode (HUD toggle is also not separate)
UCF code reworked, should feel more accurate to Melee’s implementation
Various former PSA-based character attributes and features now moved into codeset or normalized with Brawl to make PSA porting easier
Air Dodge length is no longer dependent on tilt distance
“Shield” option in Training Mode no longer gives infinite shield (activate in Code Menu instead)
Roy cosmetics revamped
Sunshine Peach semi-alt added
Samus costumes (except Fusion) and cosmetics redone
Sonic’s Z alt is now a Smash 2-styled Sonic
Ike, Knuckles, Marth, Pit, Roy, Snake, and Zero Suit Samus received facial animation updates on various moves
Captain Falcon’s dash animation cleaned up
Captain Falcon’s Final Smash utilizes formerly unused ending animation when started from the ground
Kirby’s Charge Shot now uses the same SFX as Samus’
Olimar’s Pikmin now have color-specific trail effects
Pit’s Dark Pit colors now have unique arrows, sword trails and a silver bow
ROB retains his Final Smash aura during his Final Smash’s duration
Snake's up tilt animation cleaned up
Snake’s down smash mine is now gray with a flashing top instead of purple
Snake’s down smash mine has been slightly raised in appearance to be consistently visible on all stages
Snake’s down smash dirt effect has been synchronized to the animation of digging
Snake transitions into crawl attack more smoothly and doesn’t immediately hold the knife at the start of it
Snake’s knife attacks now have glow effects, similar to other blades
Snake’s box walk taunt recoded to have smoother transitions between walking left and right
Sonic’s feet in his ball animations are no longer flat and scale properly
Various menu textures cleaned up
Many costumes and stages optimized for file size

changes.title: Music
changes: Added cirb’s Project M Theme remix to the menu and the All-Star Rest Area

changes.title: Other
changes: Optional code for loading Character Select Portraits from the Result Screen Portraits file optimized, now no longer crashes
Joining a Dolphin netplay lobby as “Spectator” will now automatically disable your port
WASAPI backend added to Dolphin
Reduced audio delay in Dolphin
Strap and Results screen updated for version 2.2
